column4: Percentage of Cases To Total Cases for investigation in Which investigation Refused (Col.4)
column5: Percentage of Cases To Total Cases for investigation in Which investigation Was Completed (Charge Found False/Mistake of Fact Or Law Etc.) (Col.5)
column6: Percentage of Cases To Total Cases for investigation in Which investigation Was Completed (Final Report True Submitted) (Col.6)
column7: Percentage of Cases To Total Cases for investigation in Which investigation Was Completed (Charge Sheets Submitted) (Col.7)
column8: Percentage of Cases To Total Cases for investigation in Which investigation Was Completed (Total) (Col.8) = {(Col.5)+(Col.6) +(Col.7)}
column9: Percentage of Cases Pending investigation at the end of the year (Col.9)

column2: Kidnapping & Abduction (sec.363-369,371-373 Ipc) - of Women & Girls
